name: ChalkDrawingSounds
0:
”Alexa, open chalk drawing sounds”
”Alexa, ask chalk drawing sounds for the latest talk”
”Alexa, start chalk drawing sounds”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: chalk drawing sounds
des: This is a 16 hour long ASMR audio file of the sound of chalk drawing on a chalk board. The length of the file is to ensure it'll last all night while you sleep until you decide to stop it.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
